<center>**Build Your Own VPS**</center>

We have rolled out our new [BYO](https://hostdoc.co.uk/build-your-own) service at the same time introducing our 2 new locations (SG&AU) to our packages offering greater choice of deployment all from only £1.50 per month with a base configuration.
Add as much RAM, Storage and vCores as is needed with the ability to add a backup plan which backs up your whole VPS daily with on demand back up's and restoration.
Bring your own ISO (and license if required) and upload on demand via your dashboard or choose from our wide range of available templates.

Base configuration ships with 256MB RAM, 1vCore, 100GB Storage and 1 IPv4, 250GB Bandwidth 1gbps port (DE, UK, CA, FR, FN) or 100GB Bandwidth 250mbps port (SG, AU) for only £1.50 Per Month.

Customizable options can be added for:

    RAM - £0.99 per GB /Month
    Storage - £0.20 per 10GB HDD /Month
    vCores - £1.20 per core /Month
    Additional IP - £1.49 /Month

Extra configurable options include bandwidth, backup plans, and the option to have your machine fully managed with cpanel included.

We are offering 20% off our [BYO](https://hostdoc.co.uk/build-your-own) plans until the end of September with promocode "BuildYourOwn" and 25% off  annual plans (automatically applied) as an introductory offer.

Please note: These plans are manually activated.


<center>**KVM VPS**</center>

With a HostDoc KVM VPS, you get; 
Choice of deployable locations.
Full root access. 
Virtualizor Control Panel. 
Weekly backup & Incremental backup's 3 times per week. 
One snapshot restore per month. 
KVM Virtualization. 
24/7 Technical Support. 
Pre-configured and customisable packages. 
NoVNC Console. 
DDoS Mitigation in all locations.
Instant Deployment.
